PLATEAU Workshop
Bringing together Programming Languages and Human-Computer Interaction

PLATEAU2026
16th annual workshop on the intersection of HCI and PL
@ Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA USA Early March, exact dates TBA!

PLATEAU will take place on the University of California, Berkeley campus in Berkeley, CA from February 19-20, 2024. Please visit this form to register.

We have a block of rooms reserved at the Hotel Shattuck Plaza in downtown Berkeley. Rooms in the block are available on a "first come, first served" basis, so plan to make your reservations sooner rather than later! You must also book no later than Thursday, January 4 in order to receive the group rate! So again, try to get your reservations in as soon as possible! If you need additional nights beyond the suggested dates, please call or email Christina Sunga (510-225-6060, christina.sunga@hotelshattuckplaza.com).

Important Dates
Wednesday, December 3rd, 2025 (AoE time)
